item.title: ACI/N9K â€“ How to convert a Nexus 9000 from ACI Mode to NX-OS (Standalone)
item.description: Get the standalone software here First you have to copy the new nexus 9000 standalone firmware to the APIC: 1 2 admin@apic1:~> scp richy@YOURIP:Downloads/nxos.7.0.3.I2.2a.bin . nxos.7.0.3.I2.2a.bin 100% 513MB 9.2MB/s 00:56 And now you can push it to the appropriate Nexus 9000. (The user/password matches the APIC) 1 2 3 admin@apic1:~> scp nxos.7.0.3.I2.2a.bin admin@leaf02:bootflash Password: nxos.7.0.3.I2.2a.bin 100% 513MB 7.0MB/s 01:13 Now reboot the switch and break into the load prompt, this can be done with Control+C in Putty.
